## Welcome!

Welcome to the course website for DS 362: Data-Driven Knowledge Discovery for Fall 2023.

This course is offered at the [University of Scranton](https://www.scranton.edu/) as taught by [Mathematics Department](https://www.scranton.edu/academics/cas/math/index.shtml) faculty member [Jason M. Graham](https://sites.google.com/site/jasonmgrahamus/) during the Fall 2023 semester.
